titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry stars at the KRNT Theaters

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) Hatch poster announcing the Grand Ole Opry stars Carl Smith, Slim Whitman, Johnny Bush, Jimmy Dickens and Grandpa Jones at the KRNT theater on October 5. Poster features metal photoplates of Carl Smith, Slim Whitman, Johnny Bush, Jimmy Dickens and Grandpa Jones.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
